description.value: Green glazed composition shabti of Tarudj born of Tentmen: with a pedestal and back-pillar. She wears a lappet-wig, has a modelled face with a plaited beard (damaged), crossed hands in relief (one missing) holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder. The waist is inscribed with a row of incised hieroglyphs. The front of the leg section is inscribed with a similar column. The figure would have been made in a mould.
